/notes/pcs.note1: This is the pcs manager config file.
/notes/pcs.note1a: The pcs page of the ui display is outlined in /assets/pcs/summay
/notes/pcs.note1b: The /assets/pcs table defines the power generation unit(s), using a template file with placements for selected key words
/notes/pcs.note2: The /config/pcs area is still under development
/notes/pcs.note3: The /components/pcs... tables (if present) define the incoming control words from the pcs system
/notes/pcs.note4: The /links/<pcss> table  (if present) defines mapping of external interface components to internal variables
/notes/pcs.note5: There are some junk/test fields as well... they will removed soon

/constants/pcs.notem: If used, move this to pcs_manager.json

/controls/pcs.notem: If used, move this to pcs_manager.json

alarm_running_state_2.note1: Bit 00: Branch circuit board communication error

mv_node_state.note1: Bit 00: Gas Relay Trip (0: normal, 1: tripping)
mv_node_state.note2: Bit 01: Gas Relay Alarm (0: normal, 1: alarm)
mv_node_state.note3: Bit 02: Oil Temperature Alarm (0: normal, 1: alarm)
mv_node_state.note4: Bit 03: Oil Temperature Trip (0: normal, 1: tripping)
mv_node_state.note5: Bit 04: Low Oil Level Trip (0: normal, 1: tripping)
mv_node_state.note6: Bit 06: Pressure Relief Trip (0: normal, 1: tripping)
mv_node_state.note7: Bit 08: MV Load Switch 1 (0: Open, 1: Close)
mv_node_state.note8: Bit 09: MV Load Switch 2 (0: Open, 1: Close)
mv_node_state.note9: Bit 10: MV Vacuum Circuit-Breaker (0: Open, 1: Close)
mv_node_state.note10: Bit 11: MV Disconnector Switch (0: Open, 1: Close)
mv_node_state.note12: Bit 14: Winding Temperature Trip (0: normal, 1: tripping)
mv_node_state.note13: Bit 15: Winding Temperature Alarm (0: normal, 1: alarm)

mv_node_state_1.note2: Bit 06: HV Room Door (0: Open, 1: Close)
mv_node_state_1.note6: Bit 13: HV Room Smoke (0: normal, 1: tripping)
mv_node_state_1.note7: Bit 14: HV Remote Control (0: remote, 1: local)

mv_node_state_2.note1: Bit 00: MV Load Switch (0: disconnected. 1: connected)
mv_node_state_2.note2: Bit 01: HV Remote Control Trip (0: normal, 1: tripping)
mv_node_state_2.note4: Bit 03: BMS Dry Contact Interface (0: Normal, 1: Fault)
mv_node_state_2.note5: Bit 04: Fast Response Control Interface (0: normal, 1: close)
